actionCalls.description: Gets the transfer details using the invocable method.
actionCalls.name: GetTransferDetails
actionCalls.label: Get Transfer Details

actionCalls.description: Send an email to the user when a case is created.
actionCalls.name: SendEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Email

value.stringValue: Your service request to Initiate Automated Customer Account Transfer was created

assignments.description: Sets the values of the fields required to send an email.
assignments.name: AssignEmailPrerequisites
assignments.label: Assign Email Prerequisites

assignments.description: Assigns Account Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the AccountNumber Text variable.
assignments.name: SetAccountNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns the Address Line 1 from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the SetAddressLine1 Text variable.
assignments.name: SetAddressLine1
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns City from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the City Text variable.
assignments.name: SetCity
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns the external investment account number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the ExternalInvestmentAccountNumber Text variable.
assignments.name: SetExternalInvestmentAccountNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns the external investment account owner value from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the ExternalInvestmentAccountOwner Text variable.
assignments.name: SetExternalInvestmentAccountOwner
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns the external investment account type from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the ExternalAccountType Text variable.
assignments.name: SetExternalInvestmentAccountType
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Financial Account Name from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the FinancialAccountName Text variable.
assignments.name: SetFinancialAccountName
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns the Financial Institution Name from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the FinancialInstitutionName Text variable.
assignments.name: SetFinancialInstitutionName
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Postal Code from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the PostalCode Text variable.
assignments.name: SetPostalCode
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns the selected action value from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the TransferAction Text variable.
assignments.name: SetSelectedAction
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns State from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the State Text variable.
assignments.name: SetState
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Transferring Firm Phone from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the TransferringFirmPhone Text variable.
assignments.name: SetTransferringFirmPhone
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

constants.description: Stores the address of the header image used in the email template.
constants.name: HeaderImageURL

decisions.description: Determines if the prerequisites to send an email are available or not.
decisions.name: HavePrerequisitesToSendAnEmail
decisions.label: Have Prerequisites To Send An Email?

decisions.description: Determines whether the email associated with the Account is available or not.
decisions.name: IsAccountEmailAvailable
decisions.label: Is Account Email Available?

decisions.description: Determines which attribute is stored in the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop.
decisions.name: SetWhichAttribute
decisions.label: Set Which Attribute?

Flow.description: Allows an agent to review the automated customer account transfer service request, and update the transfer details.

formulas.description: Creates the account name by concatenating first name and last name.
formulas.name: AccountNameFormula

formulas.description: Checks if the concatenated address is blank.
formulas.name: CheckFullAddressFormula

formulas.description: Creates the full address by concatenating the address fields.
formulas.name: FullAddressFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!AddressLine1}<>'N/A',{!AddressLine1},'')& IF({!City} <> 'N/A', IF({!AddressLine1} <>'N/A',', '+{!City},{!City}),'')& IF({!State} <> 'N/A', IF(OR({!AddressLine1} <> 'N/A',{!City} <> 'N/A'),', '+{!State},{!State}),'')& IF({!Country} <> 'N/A', IF(OR({!AddressLine1} <> 'N/A',{!City} <> 'N/A',{!State} <> 'N/A'),', '+{!Country},{!Country}),'')& IF({!PostalCode} <> 'N/A',IF(OR({!AddressLine1} <> 'N/A',{!City} <> 'N/A',{!State} <> 'N/A', {!Country} <> 'N/A'),', '+{!PostalCode},{!PostalCode}),'')

Flow.interviewLabel: FSC Wealth: Review Automated Customer Account Transfer Service Request {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: FSC Wealth: Review Automated Customer Account Transfer Service Request

loops.description: Iterates through Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Value from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
loops.name: IterateThroughServiceCatalogRequests
loops.label: Iterate Through Service Catalog Requests

recordLookups.description: Gets the service catalog request extended attribute value records with a record Id matching the serviceCatalogRequestId that was passed into the flow. Stores the results in the Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Value collection variable.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes
recordLookups.label: Get Service Catalog Request Extended Attributes

textTemplates.description: Stores the body of the email that’s sent when a case is created.
textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Your service request to initiate automated customer account transfer was created and your case number is {!CaseNumber}.

Request Summary:


Account Details
Selected Investment Account {!FinancialAccountNumber} - {!FinancialAccountName}
 
External Investment Account Details
Ownership Type {!ExternalInvestmentAccountType}
Account Number {!ExternalInvestmentAccountNumber}
Entity Name {!ExternalInvestmentAccountOwner}
Financial Institution Name {!FinancialInstitutionName}
Financial Institution Address {!CheckFullAddressFormula}

{!TransferDetails}

Thank you,
Customer Support Team

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Email of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
